originalText.text: Unfortunately I been trying to get a hold of anyone one I can from all locations and no one answers the phone not even in valley stream. I used to work for them for 3 years. tax preparer Mr. Powers does not return emails or calls i been trying for over a month now and still nothing hope nothing fraudulent is happening with my taxes. Such a shame to treat people this way. Julio and Kelvin were the best at this company and now they no longer work there.they seem to of been the only professional there and always mad sure there clients were happy. I been doing taxes there for 6 years.

originalText.text: I have been with R&G Brenner for over 10+ years, I file every year with the same person filing my taxes.. if in any case I needed questions answered Ronald Nichols always helped me out. Not only was he my tax preparer, he always greeted me with a warm smile and made me feel comfortable as I waited for my taxes to be done ..The office workers were so nice, we can talk and laugh and even smile..Felt like I gained friendships at their office..I WANT TO SAY THANK YOU AND WE WILL. CONTINUE DOING BUISNESS .THROUGHTOUT THE YEARS TO COME.üëçüíØüôÇüôÇ.

originalText.text: From the receptionist to the tax preparer you can find quality business here at R&G Brenner 125 street. The people are very friendly as well as knowledgeable and professional, I've been coming here literally for years now and each year I leave there with a smile on my face you feel good when good business is conducted. Ronald is one of the most professional and sincere business men I know I would recommend if you go there see Ronald a pleasent experience.

originalText.text:
Everyone at R&G Brenner Income Tax is patient, caring, respectful and professional. Ronald Nichols has been an accountant in my family for over four years and no matter where I‚Äôm living in this country, I will always file my taxes with him. He‚Äôs super knowledgeable, patient and feels like a true family member. I love this company and I will always refer people to file here.
Thank you for being the best!
Sincerely,
Briana H.

originalText.text:
I have been getting my taxes done here for over 10 years. I started off with Les and then Ron once he left. I must say although Ron has billions of client every year we talk quickly asking each other how things are. He has done my taxes while I been away,
while I been at other states and of course while residing in NY/NJ area. Thank you for always doing your best Ron.
